About Me

My Story So Far...

My Journey

I Started Learning Web Development Early 2019 And I have a Strong Passion for Technology. So Far in my journey i have learnt HTML, CSS, Css frameworks like BOOTSTRAP, BULMA and ANGULAR MATERIAL. I also have a good grasp of JAVASCRIPT and ANGULAR. I am Currently Working On Building A full stack Application and that has also given me a decent grasp on NODE.js And MongoDB. In addition to That i am also good at Building Websites With WORDPRESS. I am also of the Beleive that i can Always Adapt and Learn any new technology used by any Company

Technologies and tools i Work With

Html, Css, JavaScript, Angular, Wordpress and a little bit of Sass. I also have a little grasp on Server side Technologies like Node.js And MongoDB. I Mainly use Visual Studio Code for my Coding And i recently Started using the Git Work Flow In my Projects.

Sound Engineering

I am also good when it comes to handling The mixer, And Sound During Live Events.

Hobbies

My Hobbies Include Playing Football, Watching Football, Coding and learning new Technologies
